name: Gaurav Samaria
position: Consultant I at EXL || IIT Kharagpur
about: Results-oriented professional with a strong foundation in data analytics and risk management. Skilled in leveraging tools like Python, SQL, SAS, and Tableau to drive insights and optimize processes. experience.title: Django Developer Intern
experience.description: • Onboarded quickly, contributing to live projects by resolving user profile and resume upload form validation bugs.• Assisted new interns with local project setup, ensuring smooth onboarding and enhancing productivity.• Developed a Django backend for a photo background removal website, implementing secure user authentication.• Integrated a third-party API for image background removal, managing upload, processing, and download functionalities.• Improved backend reliability and user experience by fixing customer support email handling issues.
experience.description_html: • Onboarded quickly, contributing to live projects by resolving user profile and resume upload form validation bugs.• Assisted new interns with local project setup, ensuring smooth onboarding and enhancing productivity.• Developed a Django backend for a photo background removal website, implementing secure user authentication.• Integrated a third-party API for image background removal, managing upload, processing, and download functionalities.• Improved backend reliability and user experience by fixing customer support email handling issues.

experience.title: SDE Intern (Backend)
experience.description: • Contributed to the development of Fraudify, a Fraud detection platform, by implementing new changes.• Successfully delivered RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework to enable functionalities like adding, updating, deleting, and approving organizations.• Simultaneously worked on other projects, implementing minor changes in the email configuration.• Documented the newly developed APIs and the MongoDB database configurations for all projects.
